projects.title: Artistic parfumery
projects.subtitle: 2023 - Italian Alps' town
projects.description:
This project transforms the space into an elegant theatrical setting, where fragrances and the owner take center stage. Soft, flowing curtains create scenic backdrops, shaping the environment with depth and movement.

A carefully designed interplay of lighting, materials, and textures enhances the experience, turning the perfumery into a place of discovery where every detail elevates the art of scent.
